titles.title: A bill to reauthorize certain provisions relating to Indian tribal justice systems.
A bill to reauthorize certain provisions relating to Indian tribal justice systems.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

Referred to the Committee on Resources, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Resources, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committee.name: House Judiciary
committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet

bill.summary: Amends the Indian Tribal Justice Technical and Legal Assistance Act of 2000 to reauthorize certain provisions relating to: (1) training and technical assistance and civil and criminal legal assistance grants; and (2) tribal justice systems.
